text.section: Each year, the Authority shall develop and adopt a 6-year financial forecast for the operations of the Authority.

In accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the Authority shall submit to the General Assembly:
A draft of the financial forecast on submission of the budget bill to the presiding officers of the General Assembly; and
The financial forecast as approved by the Authority on or before July 1 of each year.

The financial forecast shall include, for each of the components specified in subsection (c) of this section:
Actual information for the last full fiscal year; and
Forecasts of the information for each of the 6 subsequent fiscal years, including the current fiscal year, the fiscal year for the proposed budget, and the next 4 subsequent fiscal years.
